name: A Falling Blocks Game (Tomahack)
description:
One of the most popular brick games in history, now presented with the look of the classic portable consoles of the 80's but with an updated gameplay.  The puzzle is simple but difficult to master, intuitive and exciting. Both for casual and nostalgic players, or even for experts. Download it and play for free on your mobile phone!

Features:

  • Marathon mode: test your skill, clear as many lines as possible and get the highest score.
  • Sprint mode: remove 40 lines as fast as possible.
  • Survival mode: fight against the elements for the record of survival.
  • Offline: play whenever and wherever you want.
  • No ads
  • No analytics
